properties.Name: AccountingPolicy

Columns.Name: LegalEntityId
Columns.Description:
The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

In this case it is the business, organization or legal entity whose books are being recorded and financial statements presented.

Columns.Name: AccountingPolicyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a policy.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the policy is applicable.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the policy is applicable.

Columns.Name: AccountingPolicyText
Columns.Description: The text of an accounting policy.

Columns.Name: AccountingFrameworkStandardSection
Columns.Description: The section of the Accounting Framework Standard to which the policy applies.

Columns.Name: AccountingFrameworkId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Accounting Framework.

Columns.Name: AccountingFrameworkStandardId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Accounting Framework Standard.
